content: a k2 sm k2 m1l k1 sl2 wyib to m sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif row 20 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif p1 to 3 sts before m p3 sm sl2 wyif row 21 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l k1 sl1 wyib k2 to m sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif row 8 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif row 22 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm p2 sl1 p1 to 3 sts before m p3 sm sl2 wyif wyif to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif row 9 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l k1 sl1 wyib k2 row 23 rs using a k2 sm k2 m1l sl2 wyib k1 to to m sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif 2 sts before m sl2 wyib sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif row 10 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm p2 sl1 wyif to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif row 24 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyib p1 to 2 sts before m p2 sm sl2 wyif row 11 rs using a k2 sm k2 m1l sl2 wyib k1 to 2 sts before m sl2 wyib sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif section three row 12 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyib p1 to 2 sts before m p2 sm sl2 wyif repeat section one or chart 1 4 times row 13 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l sl1 wyib k2 to m sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif section four row 14 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm p2 sl1 wyif to 3 st before m p3 sm sl2 wyif begin chart 3 or continue with written instructions below row 15 rs using a k2 sm k2 m1l k1 k1 sl2 wyib to m sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif as before there are only a few small changes in this section which calls for a sl2 wyif instead of a sl2 wyib row 16 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif these changes have been marked in red so you do not p1 to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif miss them row 17 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l k2 sl1 wyib to row 1 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l sl1 wyib k2 to 2 sts before m k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif m sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif row 18 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif sm p2 sl1 wyif to row 2 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm p2 sl1 5 sts before m p5 sm sl2 wyif wyif to 3 st before
